about_the_game:
A set of sepith that comes in handy when synthesizing quartz or unlocking slots.

Earth Sepith x 2000
Water Sepith x 2000
Fire Sepith x 2000
Wind Sepith x 2000
Time Sepith x 2000
Space Sepith x 2000
Mirage Sepith x 2000

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
